actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry (without written report).
Referred to Senate Committee on the Budget.

official_title: A resolution waiving section 303(a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S.2481.

summary.text: Waives certain requirements of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S. 2481 (Parity prices for wheat, feed grain, and cotton).

titles.title: A resolution waiving section 303(a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S.2481.
